Title: Mount Arrowsmith and Port Alberni Highway, Vancouver Island, B.C.
Description: View of Mount Arrowsmith on Vancouver Island, B.C. The Port Alberni Highway is shown in the foreground with two automobiles driving on it.

Title: On Front St. Quesnel BC
Description: Front Street in Quesnel, B.C. Four men are shown in front of a storefront.

Title: Old Stone Church, Cowichan Bay, B.C.
Description: Old Stone Church in Cowichan Bay, B.C.

Title: Evening Scene, Gorge, Victoria, B.C.
Description: View looking down the Gorge waterway in Victoria, B.C. during the evening. The Gorge Bridge is shown in the distance.

Title: Creston, B.C. - Looking West
Description: An aerial view of Creston, B.C. looking west. Surrounding mountains are shown.

Title: At the Glacier House, B.C.
Subjects: Views; Mountains; Glaciers; Buildings; Tents; Fountains
Description: View from Glacier House at Glacier, B.C. Two small buildings, a tent and  a fountain are shown.

Title: Westminster Ave. looking South, Vancouver, B.C.
Description: Westminster Avenue in Vancouver, B.C. looking south. Some storefronts and pedestrians are shown.

Title: Bathing Beach, English Bay, Vancouver, B.C.
Description: Large number of people at the bathing beach at English Bay in Vancouver, B.C. People are shown in the water and on the shore.

Title: Nanaimo B.C.
Description: Malaspina Hotel in Nanaimo, B.C. Numerous automobiles are shown parked on the street in front of the hotel. Some pedestrians are also shown.

Title: Camping Near Victoria, B.C.
Description: Three people shown sitting on the shore overlooking the water near Victoria, B.C.

Title: St. John's Presbyterian Church, Vancouver, B.C.
Description: St. John's Presbyterian Church in Vancouver, B.C. Numerous people are shown outside of the church.

Title: Picturesque scenery along the Nanimo River, Nanimo, B.C.
Description: View looking down the Nanaimo River at Nanaimo, B.C. The reflections of the surrounding trees are shown on the water.

Title: Merritt, B.C.
Description: A street in Merritt, B.C. Some storefronts and pedestrians are shown.

Title: Aerial View Showing Brockton Point & City, Vancouver, B.C.
Subjects: Aerial views; Cities & towns; Bays (Bodies of water); Mountains
Description: Aerial view of Vancouver, B.C. showing Brockton Point. The North Shore Mountains are also shown.

Title: The Parade - Race Meet, 1941
Subjects: Parades & processions; Streets; Horseback riding; Racing
Description: A parade and race meet in Williams Lake, B.C. Numerous people are shown on horseback in the parade.

Title: Parliament Bldgs., Victoria, B.C.
Description: British Columbia Parliament Buildings in Victoria, B.C. viewed from behind some trees.

Title: Wellington Ave., Chilliwack BC.
Description: Wellington Avenue in Chilliwack, B.C. Some automobiles, storefronts and pedestrians are shown.

Title: Bridge At Cultus Lake, Chilliwack, B.C.
Description: A small bridge over part of Cultus Lake, B.C.

Title: A Gala Day at English Bay Vancouver B.C.
Subjects: Bays (Bodies of water); Beaches; People; Boats; Events
Description: Two different images of a Gala Day taking place at English Bay in Vancouver, B.C.

Title: Waterfront and Shipping Vancouver, B.C.
Description: A waterfront and shipping scene in Vancouver, B.C. Several vessels are shown along the waterfront.
